designSystemProfile.name: AM Carcleaning Design DNA
designSystemProfile.description: Complete design system profile with Blue primary (#1e40af) and Gold/Blue accents (#bc9600, #1e40af)
designSystemProfile.designPhilosophy: Minimal, sophisticated, data-driven with premium positioning

visualIdentity.aestheticDirection: Clean minimalism with editorial design influences
visualIdentity.visualTone: Serious yet approachable, emphasizing credibility over playfulness

gridSystem.gutterPhilosophy: Extra wide gutters (40px+) for breathing room

sectionStructure.rhythm: Large vertical spacing between sections (120px+ desktop, 80px mobile)

contentBlocking.imagePresentation: Browser mockups, device frames, or floating cards
contentBlocking.imageTreatment: Screenshots in dark frames with subtle shadows

heroPatterns.type: Full viewport height with background imagery
heroPatterns.overlay: Dark gradient overlay (50-80% opacity) over background
heroPatterns.scrollIndicator: Optional downward arrow or scroll hint
heroPatterns.heightRule: 100vh minimum, with padding top for navigation clearance

hierarchyPattern.philosophy: Strong contrast between display and body text

displayFont.characteristics: Serif or high-contrast sans-serif, large scale (48px-120px)
displayFont.weight: Regular to Medium (400-500), avoiding heavy weights

bodyFont.usage: All paragraph text, UI elements, navigation
bodyFont.weight: Normal (400) for body, Medium (500) for emphasis

scalePattern.mobileAdjustment: Reduce display sizes by 30-40% on mobile

headlines.color: Pure black or very dark gray (#151515)
headlines.emphasis: Partial word/phrase in different color or weight
headlines.alignment: Left-aligned in content blocks, center in heroes

quotes.style: Large serif font, indented with attribution below

colorStrategy.paletteApproach: Restrained, monochromatic base with strategic accent

backgrounds.primary: Pure white or very light warm neutral
backgrounds.dark: Very dark gray/navy, never pure black
backgrounds.pattern: Alternate between white and light sections for rhythm

text.primary: Very dark gray (90-95% black) for main content
text.secondary: Medium gray (45-50% opacity) for supporting text

accents.usage: Sparingly - CTAs, highlights, interactive elements only
accents.philosophy: One primary accent color (green/blue), used minimally
accents.avoidance: Never use accent colors for large surface areas

spacingPhilosophy.principle: Generous whitespace as a premium signal

buttons.sizes: Generous padding, 40-48px height for primary CTAs
variants: Primary: Dark background, white text, subtle hover state
Secondary: Transparent with border, inverts on hover
Text: Underlined link style, color change on hover

cards.structure: Light background with subtle shadow or border

navigation.style: Transparent or white background, minimal design
navigation.sticky: Fixed on scroll with background blur or solid fill
navigation.mobile: Hamburger menu, full-screen overlay on open

imageContainers.treatment: Dark frames (black/dark gray) with subtle shadows
imageContainers.shadow: Large soft shadow (20-40px blur) for depth
imageContainers.placement: Floating/offset from grid, overlapping sections slightly

iconography.style: Minimalist line icons or simple geometric shapes
iconography.usage: Sparingly - only for clear communication benefit
iconography.color: Match text color or subtle accent

hoverStates.buttons: Background color shift or opacity change (80-90%)

transitions.easing: Ease-out for entrances, ease-in for exits
transitions.properties: Transform, opacity, color - avoid animating heavy properties

scrollAnimations.pattern: Fade-in on scroll with subtle upward movement
scrollAnimations.stagger: Delay child elements by 50-100ms for cascade effect
scrollAnimations.usage: On content blocks, cards, images - not on text

loadingStates.progress: Linear progress bar at top, not circular

desktop.layout: Full grid system, asymmetric content-image pairs

sections.spacing: Vertically centered or top-aligned with 20vh padding

sections.pattern: Image left / Content right, then flip for next section

consistency.rule1: Maintain strict vertical rhythm using 8px base unit
consistency.rule4: Use single accent color across all interactive elements
consistency.rule5: Maintain consistent section padding across all pages

hierarchy.rule1: Only one H1 per page, used in hero section
hierarchy.rule2: H2 for major section titles, H3 for sub-sections
hierarchy.rule3: Body text never exceeds 700px width for readability
hierarchy.rule4: Visual weight through size and color, not font weight
hierarchy.rule5: White space creates separation more than borders

accessibility.rule1: Minimum 4.5:1 contrast ratio for all text
accessibility.rule2: All interactive elements minimum 44x44px touch target
accessibility.rule3: Focus states clearly visible with 2px outline
accessibility.rule4: Alt text for all images, empty alt for decorative
accessibility.rule5: Semantic HTML structure with proper heading hierarchy

cssApproach.methodology: CSS Custom Properties (variables) for all design tokens

images.lazyLoading: Native lazy loading for below-fold images
images.aspectRatio: Maintain aspect ratios with CSS aspect-ratio property

fonts.subsetting: Subset fonts to used characters for performance

whenCreatingLayouts: Start with full-screen hero with background image + dark overlay
Alternate between white and light beige backgrounds for sections
Use 120px vertical spacing between major sections on desktop
Create asymmetric content-image pairs (40/60 or 50/50 splits)
Use 3-column grid for feature lists on desktop, stack on mobile
Maintain max-width of 1200px for content containers
whenStylingText: Use large serif or high-contrast font for headlines (60-120px)
Use clean sans-serif for body text (16-18px)
Use medium gray (#737373) for secondary text
Use very dark gray (#151515) for primary text, not pure black
Add generous line-height (1.5-1.6) for body text
whenChoosingColors: Start with white, very light beige, and very dark gray
Add single accent color (blue or green) for CTAs only
Use color sparingly - mostly monochromatic palette
Apply 40-60% dark overlay on background images
Never use accent colors for large surface areas
Maintain high contrast (4.5:1 minimum) for readability
whenAddingInteractivity: Use subtle hover states - opacity change or slight color shift
Add subtle scale (1.02-1.05x) on card hover
Use ease-out timing for natural feel
whenCreatingComponents: Use dark background + white text for primary CTAs
Create cards with light background and subtle shadow
Frame screenshots in dark browser/device mockups
Keep icons minimal and line-based, 24-32px size
Make navigation transparent/minimal with text-only links
whenOptimizingForMobile: Stack all content in single column
Test on actual mobile devices for real-world validation

commonPitfallsToAvoid: Don't use multiple accent colors - stick to one
Don't make border-radius too large - keep minimal
Don't use heavy font weights - prefer Regular or Medium
Don't crowd content - embrace white space
Don't use pure black (#000) - use very dark gray instead
Don't animate too many elements - be selective
Don't make paragraphs full-width - limit to 600-700px
Don't use decorative elements without purpose
Don't ignore mobile experience - design mobile-first
Don't sacrifice performance for visual effects
keyDifferentiators: Editorial-style typography with strong serif headlines
Extremely generous white space as premium signal
Restrained color palette with strategic accent usage
Product screenshots always in device/browser frames
Alternating section backgrounds for visual rhythm
Minimal UI chrome - almost invisible navigation and buttons
Data-driven messaging with clear value propositions
Professional photography with consistent dark overlays
